title: Apple’s assault on the smart home: Does HomeKit have what it takes to win the market?
text:
Apple’s assault on the smart home: Does HomeKit have what it takes to win the market? 
Published By: MacDailyNews.com - Today 
Apple's HomeKit, a home automation framework designed to get separate smart home devices talking to each other, all controlled centrally
